file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-12-13-04 - STORM WINDOW MOLDING - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL STORM WINDOW MOLDING - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the LH/RH storm window fairing. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY LH/RH STORM WINDOW FAIRING - RE- ALL 25-12-13-000-801-A MOVAL LH/RH STORM WINDOW FAIRING - IN- ALL 25-12-13-400-801-A STALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 25-12-13 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-12-13-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. LH/RH STORM WINDOW FAIRING - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the LH/RH storm window fairing. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit H. Removal (Figure 401) (Figure 402) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the LH storm window fairing (Figure 401) as follows: (a) Remove the screws (3) and the washers (2) that attach the front fairing (1). (b) Remove the screws (5) and the washers (4) that attach the lower fairing (6). (c) Remove the screws (7) and the washers (8) that attach the rear fairing (9). (2) Remove the RH storm window fairing (Figure 402) as follows: (a) Remove the screws (3) and the washers (2) that attach the front fairing (1). (b) Remove the screws (5) and the washers (4) that attach the lower fairing (6). (c) Remove the screws (7) and the washers (8) that attach the rear fairing (9). AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL LH Storm Window Fairing - Removal/Installation Figure 401 B A ZONE 223 DET. A 1. FRONT FAIRING 2. WASHER 9. REAR FAIRING 3. SCREW 4. WASHER 8. WASHER 5. SCREW 7. SCREW 6. LOWER FAIRING DET. B 145AMM251796.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-12-13 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL RH Storm Window Fairing - Removal/Installation Figure 402 B A ZONE 224 DET. A 1. FRONT FAIRING 2. WASHER 9. REAR FAIRING 3. SCREW 4. WASHER 8. WASHER 5. SCREW 7. SCREW 6. LOWER DET. B FAIRING 145AMM251798.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-12-13 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-12-13-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. LH/RH STORM WINDOW FAIRING - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the LH/RH storm window fairing. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit H. Installation (Figure 401) (Figure 402) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the LH storm window fairing (Figure 401) as follows: (a) Install the rear fairing (9) with the washers (8) and screws (7). (b) Install the lower fairing (6) with the washers (4) and screws (5). (c) Install the front fairing (1) with the washers (2) and screws (3). (2) Install the RH storm window fairing (Figure 402) as follows: (a) Install the rear fairing (9) with the washers (8) and screws (7). (b) Install the lower fairing (6) with the washers (4) and screws (5). (c) Install the front fairing (1) with the washers (2) and screws (3).
